channel.title: Pasion de las Pasiones: La Rueda siempre gira
channel.description:
![roulette|400x400](upload://ajIMIBbwQAGpGMosx6hUScDCqsd.jpeg)
"La Rueda siempre gira" is a Telenovella set around the glamorous "Casino Grande".
This is a casino where the great and the good gather to play in elegant surroundings of marble and gold. All the beautiful people gather here, each holding their own dark secret. Movie stars mix with politicians and mobsters.
Within the walls of Casino Grande hearts are won and hearts are broken but one thing is always assured.
The wheel always turns.
---
We will be playing a three hour session of *Pasion de las Pasiones*.
The x-card will be used as our primary safety tool and the session will be recorded for Youtube.
[date=2019-06-03 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcISnz3W75Sc6wYqGZ3 [date=2019-06-10 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcIT9c4CiYZEV6H9G4- [date=2019-06-17 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcITJB2L2AiUcW1Z1aF [date=2019-06-24 time=19:30:00 timezone="Europe/London"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LcITiZPdaI8Txz3QB2s
